title: Adobe Flex 2: Training from the Source
description: An official Adobe tutorial offers thorough coverage of Adobe Flex 2.0, the new development framework for Rich Internet Applications, describing the latest features of the technology and how they can be used to build Web applications using Flex Builder, MXML, and ActionScript 3.0, accompanied by a CD-ROM containing all files used in the lessons as well as completed projects. Original. (Intermediate/Advanced)
author: James Talbot
